title: Elegant Birthday Portrait with Tiara and Spotlight
prompt: Based on reference image, the woman with her specific facial features, long wavy brown hair, and silver tiara is shown in a profile pose, blowing out the "28" gold candles on the chocolate cake she holds. She wears the same black sequined gown against the grey wall with the dramatic circular spotlight shadow. The studio lighting highlights her and the cake.

title: Minimalist Fashion Birthday Portrait in Black
prompt: Based on reference image, a fashion photograph of a woman with the likeness of the subject, crouching in an oversized black blazer, sunglasses, and sheer black gloves. She holds a small black tiered birthday cake with "28" candles. The setting is a minimalist white studio with dramatic side lighting.

title: Elegant Red Editorial Birthday Portrait with Balloons
prompt: A photorealistic studio portrait using the exact same female face from the reference image (same facial structure, eye shape, lips, nose, skin tone, and expression). The subject is a young woman seated gracefully on a glossy dark studio floor, surrounded by scattered red balloons. She wears an elegant deep red corset-style dress with a structured bodice and a full, textured skirt featuring subtle floral patterns. The dress has a luxurious satin and brocade finish. Her posture is poised and confident, legs folded to one side. She holds a small round white birthday cake in one hand, decorated with red cherries, red ribbon accents, and a sparkling silver “18” topper. In her other hand, she delicately holds a single red cherry by the stem. Her hair is styled in a soft, romantic updo with loose curled tendrils framing her face. She wears minimal but elegant jewelry: a pearl necklace with a small drop pendant and a matching pearl bracelet. Lighting is dramatic and cinematic: a soft circular spotlight behind her creates a halo effect against a neutral gray background, while gentle studio lighting highlights her face, dress texture, and the glossy floor reflections. Color palette is dominated by rich reds, soft whites, and neutral grays. Mood is elegant, celebratory, slightly dramatic, and high-fashion editorial. Ultra-high resolution, sharp focus, shallow depth of field, professional studio photography, realistic skin texture, natural makeup, soft shadows.

title: 1980s Retro Studio Glam
prompt: Convert my selfie into a highly realistic 4K HD 1980s retro studio glam portrait. Keep my face completely unchanged with accurate skin texture, pores, and natural details. Use dramatic studio lighting with soft highlights and deep shadows, inspired by 1980s fashion photography. Add subtle neon reflections, rich saturation, and clean contrast while maintaining realism. The background should feature a soft gradient or classic studio backdrop with retro vibes. Apply gentle film grain and slight glow for authenticity. Ensure professional sharpness, cinematic depth, and ultra-realistic details that make the image look like a high-end 1980s magazine cover shot on analog film.

title: 1960s Black and White Cinematic Portrait
prompt: Create a 4K ultra-realistic black-and-white 1960s cinematic portrait using my uploaded selfie. Do not change my facial structure, expression, or identity. The final image should feel emotional, cinematic, and realistic, like a still from a classic 1960s black-and-white movie.
